014
015package de.softwareforge.testing.postgres.embedded;
016
017import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkNotNull;
018import static java.lang.String.format;
019
020import java.io.InputStream;
021import java.util.Objects;
022import java.util.function.Supplier;
023
024import org.slf4j.Logger;
025import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
026
027/**
028 * Resolves pre-bundled PostgreSQL archives from the classpath. This matches the pre-bundled versions of PostgreSQL from
029 * https://github.com/zonkyio/embedded-postgres-binaries.
030 */
031public final class ZonkyIOPostgresLocator implements Supplier<InputStream> {
032
033    public static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(ZonkyIOPostgresLocator.class);
034
035    private final String architecture;
036    private final String os;
037
038    public ZonkyIOPostgresLocator(String os, String architecture) {
039        this.os = checkNotNull(os, "os is null");
040        this.architecture = checkNotNull(architecture, "architecture is null");
041        LOG.debug(format("Detected a %s %s system", architecture, os));
042    }
043
044    ZonkyIOPostgresLocator() {
045        this(computeOS(), computeArchitecture());
046    }
047
048    @Override
049    public InputStream get() {
050        return ZonkyIOPostgresLocator.class.getResourceAsStream(format("/postgres-%s-%s.txz", computeOS(), computeArchitecture()));
051    }
052
053    @Override
054    public String toString() {
055        return format("ZonkyIO Stream locator for PostgreSQL (arch: %s os: %s)", architecture, os);
056    }
057
058    @Override
059    public boolean equals(Object o) {
060        if (this == o) {
061            return true;
062        }
063        if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass()) {
064            return false;
065        }
066        ZonkyIOPostgresLocator that = (ZonkyIOPostgresLocator) o;
067        return architecture.equals(that.architecture) && os.equals(that.os);
068    }
069
070    @Override
071    public int hashCode() {
072        return Objects.hash(architecture, os);
073    }
074
075    private static String computeArchitecture() {
076        String architecture = EmbeddedUtil.OS_ARCH;
077        if (EmbeddedUtil.IS_ARCH_X86_64) {
078            architecture = "x86_64";  // Zonky uses x86_64
079        } else if (EmbeddedUtil.IS_ARCH_AARCH64) {
080            if (EmbeddedUtil.IS_OS_MAC) {
081                // Mac binaries are fat binaries stored as x86_64
082                architecture = "x86_64";
083            } else {
084                architecture = "arm_64";
085            }
086        } else if (EmbeddedUtil.IS_ARCH_AARCH32) {
087            architecture = "arm_32";
088        }
089        return architecture;
090    }
091
092    private static String computeOS() {
093        String os = EmbeddedUtil.OS_NAME;
094        if (EmbeddedUtil.IS_OS_LINUX) {
095            os = "linux";
096        } else if (EmbeddedUtil.IS_OS_MAC) {
097            os = "darwin";
098        } else if (EmbeddedUtil.IS_OS_WINDOWS) {
099            os = "windows";
100        }
101        return os;
102    }
103}
